kickstart.post:
# Remove /etc/profile.d files in favor of loadable modules when available if test -f /etc/profile.d/paraview.sh; then
/bin/rm -f /etc/profile.d/paraview.*
if test `grep -c /opt/modulefiles/applications /etc/profile.d/modules.csh` = 0; then echo 'setenv MODULEPATH /opt/modulefiles/applications:$MODULEPATH' >> \ /etc/profile.d/modules.csh fi if test `grep -c /opt/modulefiles/applications /etc/profile.d/modules.sh` = 0; then echo 'export MODULEPATH=/opt/modulefiles/applications:$MODULEPATH' >> \ /etc/profile.d/modules.sh fi
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/paraview
#%Module1.0 prepend-path PATH /opt/paraview/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH /usr/local/lib
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "3.12.0"
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/paraview/.version.3.12.0 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/paraview/.version
fi
